scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-with-coverage
scripts.test-dev: npm run lint -- --max-warnings=0 && npm run build-dev && npm run test-with-coverage
scripts.test-with-coverage: c8 -n src -r html cross-env npm run test-unit
scripts.test-with-coverage_lcov: c8 --clean false --temp-directory ../../coverage/tmp  --report-dir ../../coverage/geodesy -n src --reporter=lcov cross-env npm run test-unit
scripts.bump: if [ -z $npm_config_level ]; then grunt bump:minor;  else grunt bump:$npm_config_level; fi
